languages.text: "Того дня я буду ждать с нетерпением, шерин! И слава Великому, что обделил ваше сердце надменным равнодушием".

traits.locale_text: {n}Угли черных глаз вспыхивают, обдавая жаром надежды.{/n} "Того дня я буду ждать с нетерпением, шерин! И слава Великому, что обделил ваше сердце надменным равнодушием".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."
languages.original_text: "Того дня я буду ждать с нетерпением, шерин! И слава Великому, что обделил ваше сердце надменным равнодушием".

traits.locale_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."

traits.locale_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしはその日を楽しみにしていたのよ、シャリーン！そしてあんたの心に傲慢で無関心な、そんな惨めな部分を与えてくださったエグザルテッド・ワンに称賛あれ」
languages.original_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしはその日を楽しみにしていたのよ、シャリーン！そしてあんたの心に傲慢で無関心な、そんな惨めな部分を与えてくださったエグザルテッド・ワンに称賛あれ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我衷心期待着那一天的到来，亲爱的！赞美至高无上的神皇，感谢祂赐予了你没有一丝冷漠与傲慢的心灵。”
languages.original_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."

traits.locale_text: “我衷心期待着那一天的到来，亲爱的！赞美至高无上的神皇，感谢祂赐予了你没有一丝冷漠与傲慢的心灵。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Espero con ansia ese día, shereen! Y alabado sea el Exaltado por ponerle tan poca altanería e indiferencia en ese corazón de oro».
languages.original_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."

traits.locale_text: «¡Espero con ansia ese día, shereen! Y alabado sea el Exaltado por ponerle tan poca altanería e indiferencia en ese corazón de oro».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'attendrai ce jour avec impatience, shereen ! Et que l'Exalté soit loué pour vous avoir octroyé un cœur assez généreux pour accorder un misérable fragment d'attention dédaigneuse à notre encontre. »
languages.original_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."

traits.locale_text: « J'attendrai ce jour avec impatience, shereen ! Et que l'Exalté soit loué pour vous avoir octroyé un cœur assez généreux pour accorder un misérable fragment d'attention dédaigneuse à notre encontre. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich freue mich schon auf diesen Tag, Shereen! Und gepriesen sei der Erhabene, weil er Euer Herz mit so einer kümmerlichen Portion überheblicher Gleichgültigkeit gesegnet hat."
languages.original_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."

traits.locale_text: "Ich freue mich schon auf diesen Tag, Shereen! Und gepriesen sei der Erhabene, weil er Euer Herz mit so einer kümmerlichen Portion überheblicher Gleichgültigkeit gesegnet hat."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O günü iple çekiyorum şirinim! Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun ki kibirden, ilgisizlikten nasibini çok az almışsın."
languages.original_text: "I look forward to that day, shereen! And praise be to the Exalted One for bestowing such a miserly portion of haughty indifference upon your heart."

traits.locale_text: "O günü iple çekiyorum şirinim! Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun ki kibirden, ilgisizlikten nasibini çok az almışsın."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
